screenshot_plugin_announce_do_not_show.message: Do not show this message again

screenshot_plugin_chrome_38_retina_bug.message:
D'oh!

That happened again! Google Chrome has a terrible bug related to the screenshot functionality on high-dpi monitors. Browser downscales the whole image, so you will see blurred screenshot instead of high quality screenshot. Though the bug is marked as fixed in a bug tracker the fix will be released only with Chrome 39 or 40 version. We can not do anything with that.
We strongly recommend you to try Lightshot desktop application. It works exactly like it was before and is not affected by changes in Google Chrome. You can download it from here: http://app.prntscr.com/
We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

screenshot_plugin_chrome_bug_copy.message:
Unfortunately Google Chrome does not provide support for copying images to clipboard with API, so we had to turn it off. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

How you can help?
There is an issue in a Google Chrome bugtracker about that. You can mark it with the star, so it will have more priority and will be fixed sooner.

Or you can use Lightshot stand alone application. Copy feature works perfectly there. You can download it from http://app.prntscr.com/

Click "Ok" to open Google Chrome issue tracker.
Click "Cancel" to close this dialog.

screenshot_plugin_go_to_mac_store.message: We apologize for the inconvenience, but Lightshot extension runs only on Windows computers. If you want Lightshot for Mac please download it from Mac App Store. Go to App Store now?

screenshot_plugin_image_hosting_incorrec.message: Incorrect JSON structure in response from image hosting server

screenshot_plugin_npapi_deprecated_messa.message:
What happened to the good old Lightshot?

As you may know Google Chrome will stop supporting NPAPI plugins in September. So we had to adjust to this change.
Moving from NPAPI to Javascript was not painless. Currently we lost "Copy" feature because of this Google Chrome issue. And some other features were also affected.
If you love the previous version and don't like these changes we encourage you to try Lightshot desktop application. It works exactly like it was before and is not affected by changes in Google Chrome. You can download it from here: http://app.prntscr.com/
You can read more about new version here.
We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
